SELECT k.idx AS idx_keyword , k.code , k.keyword , pk.idx_post FROM POST_KEYWORD pk JOIN KEYWORD k ON k.idx = pk.idx_keyword WHERE pk.idx_post = #{idx_post}
SELECT p.idx AS idx_post , pf.idx AS idx_post_file , pf.file_name , pf.file_path FROM POST_FILE pf JOIN POST p ON p.idx = pf.idx_post WHERE pf.idx_post = #{idx_post}
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET delete_yn = 'Y' , update_data = NOW() WHERE idx = #{idx_post}
